reviewText:
Its very nice to view the old reruns. Their really weren't to many
really good TV family shows and Sonny and Cher were great. And it still
saddens me abit when I view the last few shows - knowing that they were
having marital problems.
Its a very good dvd.
If you already own the DVD Box Set then you already own this episode!  If you are just curious to see what The Sonny & Cher show was, then by all means by this today!
